"""Function to train a Gaussian process."""
kdict = [{'type': 'gaussian', 'width': 0.5, 'scaling': 1.0}, {'type':
    'linear', 'scaling': 1.0}, {'type': 'constant', 'const': 1.0}, {'type':
    'quadratic', 'slope': 1.0, 'degree': 1.0, 'scaling': 1.0}]
self.__class__.gp = GaussianProcess(train_fp=train_features, train_target=
    train_targets, kernel_list=kdict, regularization=np.sqrt(0.001),
    optimize_hyperparameters=True, scale_data=False)
io.write(filename='test-model', model=self.gp, ext='pkl')
io.write(filename='test-model', model=self.gp, ext='hdf5')
